H0.text: At which school was Captain Hook educated. Harrow School

H1.text: At which school was Captain Hook educated. Rugby School

H2.text: At which school was Captain Hook educated. Charterhouse School

H3.text: At which school was Captain Hook educated. Eton

A4.text: In the play, it is implied that Hook attended Eton College and Balliol College, Oxford

A5.text: According to the 2007 novel ... James Matthew is reared by a Shakespearean actress he calls Aunt Emily, and unwillingly attends Eton College as an Oppidan scholar
